ygData.subject: Re: Doh! *Was- hey Harmonic!*
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack!!  I ve been duped again!  (damn erudite mind tricks)  I never said the zone was complete, I just wanted Harm to know that yes indeed there was going to be
ygData.messageBody:
Ack!! I've been duped again! (damn erudite mind tricks) I never said the
zone was complete,
I just wanted Harm to know that yes indeed there was going to be a second
use for that optional
download button. And Talies, about this crystal ball, where can I buy one
eh? Would it be worth
a full suit of lambent and say 500pp? Come on....

I did see apost that the Hole was soon to be up as well, and Abashi also
mentioned a third zone
on Odus that would be implemented. He was very tight lipped about this one
though -- and no its
not Kerra Ridge - allegedly.

So for now I will return to my lurker status :(

Weiland the Ignorant
On the trail of the:
Crytal Ball of the Moderator
Magic Item Lore Item No Drop
1 Hand Blunt
+ 50 Int
+ 50 Wis
Effect: HAZAH!
Race: ALL
Class: Moderator
~usable in the either hand, procs HAZAH!! a level 50 Brain Fry spell~
<this item has not yet been implemented on the live servers =)>

>
>
> The crystal ball tells me much - first of all, this zone is not yet
> complete. Second, it appears full of rats, bats, beetles and kobolds, so
I
> wonder about the "high level" concept - methinks it is actually for
> low-level necros and such. Third, any queries as to the nature of my
> crystal ball shall be ignored ;) It wouldn't be a mystery if I told you,
> now would it?
>
> Talies the Wanderer
>
